1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Let's <break time='200ms'/> talk <break time='200ms'/> about <break time='200ms'/> our <break time='200ms'/> family. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

2.text: There are....... I'm ........ He is... She is.....
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>There <break time='200ms'/> are....... <break time='200ms'/> I'm <break time='200ms'/> ........ <break time='200ms'/> He <break time='200ms'/> is... <break time='200ms'/> She <break time='200ms'/> is..... <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>e.g. <break time='200ms'/> :- <break time='200ms'/> I'm <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='dasun'>Dasun</phoneme>. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

5.text: There are five members in my family.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>There <break time='200ms'/> are <break time='200ms'/> five <break time='200ms'/> members <break time='200ms'/> in <break time='200ms'/> my <break time='200ms'/> family. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>My <break time='200ms'/> father <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> .................... <break time='200ms'/> (name) <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

10.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>My <break time='200ms'/> mother <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> ............. <break time='200ms'/> (name) <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

12.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>My <break time='200ms'/> sister <break time='200ms'/> is............. <break time='200ms'/> (name) <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

14.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>My <break time='200ms'/> brother <break time='200ms'/> is.............. <break time='200ms'/> (name) <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

15.text: He is ............ I love my family.
15.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>He <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> ............ <break time='200ms'/> I <break time='200ms'/> love <break time='200ms'/> my <break time='200ms'/> family. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

16.text: Divide the students into groups of three. Ask them to introduce their family.
16.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Divide <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> students <break time='200ms'/> into <break time='200ms'/> groups <break time='200ms'/> of <break time='200ms'/> three. <break time='200ms'/> Ask <break time='200ms'/> them <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> introduce <break time='200ms'/> their <break time='200ms'/> family. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>
